primary_changes.description: Uncommented and tested RenameDirectory functionality in DemoCli

secondary_changes.description: Auto-generated API documentation updates reflecting code changes and inheritance chain simplifications
Session tracking and progress update from session 10 to 11

file_insights.documentation_pattern: Consistent updates to inheritance chains, interface implementations, and event type signatures across all documentation files

patterns_discovered.description: Automatic API documentation regeneration triggered by code changes, updating inheritance hierarchies and interface implementations
Removal of redundant IEquatable intermediate representations in inheritance chains (e.g., direct implementation vs chained IEquatable declarations)
examples: BinaryFileNode: Removed duplicate IEquatable entries from inheritance chain

patterns_discovered.description: Correction of event type signatures in documentation to explicitly show generic Action parameters
Enhanced documentation explicitly listing all implemented interfaces including System.IEquatable<T>
Status file tracking session progression and subtask completion metrics

gotchas_discovered.description: Uncommenting code triggers comprehensive API documentation regeneration across 100+ files. This can create large commits and make the actual code change harder to identify
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Separate documentation regeneration from functional code changes in commit strategy

gotchas_discovered.description: Documentation generator was producing verbose inheritance chains with duplicate IEquatable declarations. The fix appears to be a generator improvement, not a code change
gotchas_discovered.context: May indicate documentation tooling upgrade or configuration change

gotchas_discovered.description: Event signatures previously showed System.Action without generic parameter hints, now showing explicit Action<T> with parameter types
gotchas_discovered.resolution: Likely a documentation generator fix for better API clarity

gotchas_discovered.description: Session marked as SUCCESS but actual test output/verification details not visible in diff - success assumption based on completion without error reports
gotchas_discovered.note: No explicit test assertions visible in provided diff

approach_outcome.description: Uncomment and test RenameDirectory in DemoCli
approach_outcome.key_achievement: Successfully uncommented and tested RenameDirectory functionality
approach_outcome.side_effects: Triggered comprehensive API documentation regeneration and updates to type definitions

recommendations.recommendation: Implement documentation generation as separate build step
recommendations.rationale: Auto-generated documentation changes overwhelm the actual functional code changes in diffs, making code review difficult
recommendations.action: Configure doc generation to run in CI/CD pipeline only, exclude from dev commits when possible

recommendations.recommendation: Add explicit test verification output to session logs
recommendations.rationale: While marked as SUCCESS, no test assertions or verification details visible in commit data
recommendations.action: Include test execution summary in commit messages or session metadata

recommendations.rationale: Inheritance chain improvements and event type clarity suggest tooling changes
recommendations.action: Document generator version in build configuration

recommendations.rationale: Only 1 subtask remaining (90% completion), momentum suggests bundling final task
recommendations.action: Review final subtask for potential combination with current work

recommendations.recommendation: Create focused diff view excluding auto-generated files
recommendations.rationale: Makes actual code changes more visible in PR reviews
recommendations.action: Filter docs/api directory in PR view or use gitattributes for generated files
